meta.title: Monumentum - Building more than software to next generations

about.title: We are Monumentum!
about.text: In latin the word Monumentum means Monument that means something built to be remembered and commemorated. And that's exactlly what we want to do, build more than software to the next generations

cards.title: The Brief
cards.text: We schedule an one hour meeting to get the customer brief and understand your dream.

cards.title: The Purpose
cards.text: In few hours we will analyze your case and give you a time and money estimation.

cards.title: The Dream
cards.text: In the end you get your dream and a part of the payment will be redirected to social projects.

openSource.title: From DEVs to DEVs
openSource.text: We have three solid rocks behind Monumentum: People > Technology, Live is short to live for yourself and If could be Generic Will Be Generic! That's the reason why we share many of our libraries to help another developers life!

socialProjects.title: Happiness only exists if you share
socialProjects.text: Part of our money will be DIRECTLY redirected to social causes during negociations, at least Monumentum spend some of you own money/resources maintaining and support social projects!
